attributes.title: SO BAD
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app ever took forever to download and then it so laggy like I can’t do anything stop me from doing anything that I wanna do on the app this app is so bad do not download it it’s such a terrible app

attributes.title: nasty, sexist, racist, pervert app !
attributes.review: App was absolutely terrible my phone kept glitching and when i got it to work it would boot me out the app, just trying to get some insight but just caused headaches. 1 star is to much for this this nasty, sexist, pervert app 😩

attributes.title: Do not get
attributes.review: I’m not just giving this 1 star because of our Cheeto president but because I feel forced to put in information to a president that I don’t trust. I also don’t approve of them banning tiktok srry

attributes.title: Do you think we’re stupid
attributes.review: Yes, you may be able to ban an app, but you can’t ban people’s opinions. We will move to another, then another, than another. You can’t stop us dick breath.

attributes.title: Bruh moment
attributes.review: It was so laggy every time I swiped I couldn’t even look because it look blurry it was just so trash I recommend you to never get this game but only if ya wanna leave a bad review

attributes.title: This app is garbage 🤮
attributes.review: When I first opened the app I wanted to kill my self it’s sooo disgusting it’s like if you would walk into a motel and see a drunk homeless person throughing up on the bed then you have to sleep in that bed

attributes.title: Black and Hispanic lives matter
attributes.review: I absolutely hate this app and that reason is because I hate trump all the trump supporters belong to the streets and if trump wants to take our app tiktok down we will take his stupid app down DON’T vote for trump

attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review:
Worst app I have ever downloaded in my life I have never used such a horrible app I mean seriously who ever designed this needs help. 
Im honestly not surprised horrible app to match our horrible president this app is 🧚🏻🧚🏻 TRASH🧚🏻🧚🏻❤️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Do not download this app both my thumbs fell off and I couldn’t read for 6 hours !!!! All because of the choice of font and music it also took FOREVER to download

attributes.title: started my iPhone on FIRE and killed my ant farm!?????
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the trumps and the next morning all my ants in their ant farm are DEAD and with my phone in FLAMES next to it???? I am very very disappointed. Make my ant farm great again smh 😔
